content:
X.500 Design Goals

  • single hierarchical global official Directory

    with flexible delegated administration

  • naming all nameable things, with official names

    real-world thing might have many entries/names

  • White Pages as killer app

    Person and Organization as key objects;
    but support for nodes, processes, etc, too

  • End-user accessible

    supporting browsing, discovery, viewing, modifying
    program access too, particularly X.400 mail routing

  • secure (access-controlled)

    defining its own authentication/authorization space;
    DS entries become security principals
